Name: Risk Portfolio
Description: Do [sword]1 damage[;] plus|[sword]1 per unused tails ([sword]<evar:unusedtails>)|
Script: On Execute: if(simulation) { bonus(-1000); } else { var temp = 1; if(self != null) { if(self.dicepool != null){ if(self.dicepool.length > 0) { for(di in self.dicepool) { if(di.available()) { if(di.basevalue % 2 == 1) temp++; } } } } } attack(temp); sfxdamage(target|temp); }
Script: On any equipment use: var temp = 1; if(self != null) { if(self.dicepool != null){ if(self.dicepool.length > 0) { for(d in self.dicepool) { if(d.available()) { if(d.basevalue % 2 == 1) temp++; } } } } } e.setvar(~unusedtails~[;]temp);
Script: On any countdown reduce: var temp = 1; if(self != null) { if(self.dicepool != null){ if(self.dicepool.length > 0) { for(d in self.dicepool) { if(d.available()) { if(d.basevalue % 2 == 1) temp++; } } } } } e.setvar(~unusedtails~[;]temp);

Script: On any countdown reduce: var temp = 1; if(self != null) { if(self.dicepool != null){ if(self.dicepool.length > 0) { for(d in self.dicepool) { if(d.available()) { if(d.basevalue % 2 == 1) temp++; } } } } } e.setvar(~unusedtails~[;]temp);

Name: Pawn Shop
Description: Return two gold coins|[gray](once per battle)

Name: Pawn Shop_upgraded
Description: Return a gold heads|and a gold tails|[gray](once per battle)

Name: Pawn Shop_downgraded
Description: Return two silver coins|[gray](once per battle)

Name: Loan Shark
Script: On Execute: attack(7); sfxdamage(target|7); jinx(~Loan Shark~|~take [sword]%VAR% damage~|~Take [sword]%VAR% damage~|~attack(%VAR%); sfxdamage(null|%VAR%);~|self|self|1|2);  sfx(~_thinghappens~);

Name: Loan Shark_upgraded
Script: On Execute: attack(7); sfxdamage(target|7); jinx(~Loan Shark~|~take [sword]%VAR% damage~|~Take [sword]%VAR% damage~|~attack(%VAR%); sfxdamage(null|%VAR%);~|self|self|2|2);  sfx(~_thinghappens~);

Name: Tax Break
Description: Heads: Do [sword]3 damage|Tails: Delay jinxes by [jinx]1
Script: On Execute: if(d%2==0) {attack(3); sfxdamage(target|3);} else {if(self.status.length > 0) {var t = self.status.copy(); for(st in t){if (st.type.split(~_~)[0] == ~jinx~) {st.add(2);} }  boostjinxcountdowns(self|1); } }

Name: Tax Break_upgraded
Description: Heads: Do [sword]3 damage|Tails: Delay jinxes by [jinx]1|
Script: On Execute: if(d%2==0) {attack(3); sfxdamage(target|3);} else {if(self.status.length > 0) {var t = self.status.copy(); for(st in t){if (st.type.split(~_~)[0] == ~jinx~) {st.add(2);} }  boostjinxcountdowns(self|1); } }

Description: On Gold: Do [sword]2 damage| and gain [shield]2|

Description: Do [sword]5 damage|Add a Tails to the CPU

Name: Defraud
Description: Do [sword]3 damage|Delay jinxes by [jinx]3 turns|[gray](once per battle)
Script: On Execute: attack(3); sfxdamage(target|3); if(self.status.length > 0) {var t = self.status.copy(); for(st in t){if (st.type.split(~_~)[0] == ~jinx~) {st.add(4);} }  boostjinxcountdowns(self|1); }

Name: Defraud_upgraded
Description: Do [sword]5 damage|Delay jinxes by [jinx]5 turns|[gray](once per battle)
Script: On Execute: attack(5); sfxdamage(target|5); if(self.status.length > 0) {var t = self.status.copy(); for(st in t){if (st.type.split(~_~)[0] == ~jinx~) {st.add(6);} }  boostjinxcountdowns(self|1); }

Name: Pump and Dump
Description: Convert to gold. Next turn[;]|the enemy gains [fury]fury
Script: On Execute: givedice(d+4);  jinx(~Pump and Dump~|~the enemy gains [fury]fury~|~The enemy gains [fury]fury~|~inflictself(FURY); sfx(\~_fury\~);~|self|self|1|1);

Name: Pump and Dump_upgraded
Description: Convert to gold. In [jinx]2 turns[;]|the enemy gains [fury]fury
Script: On Execute: givedice(d+4);  jinx(~Pump and Dump~|~the enemy gains [fury]fury~|~The enemy gains [fury]fury~|~inflictself(FURY); sfx(\~_fury\~);~|self|self|2|1);

Name: Pump and Dump_downgraded
Description: Flip this coin. Next turn[;]|the enemy gains [fury]fury
Script: On Execute: if(d<=2) {givedice(3-d);} else {givedice((7-d)+4)}  jinx(~Pump and Dump~|~the enemy gains [fury]fury~|~The enemy gains [fury]fury~|~inflictself(FURY); sfx(\~_fury\~);~|self|self|1|1);

Name: Toss Up
Script: On Execute: attack(3); sfxdamage(target[;]3); var c = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween()){ if(mydice.basevalue<=2) {mydice.animatereroll(rand([1|2]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} else {mydice.animatereroll(rand([5|6]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} c++; } }

Name: Toss Up_upgraded
Script: On Execute: attack(3); sfxdamage(target[;]3); var c = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween()){ if(mydice.basevalue<=2) {mydice.animatereroll(rand([1|2]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} else {mydice.animatereroll(rand([5|6]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} c++; } }

Script: On Execute: var c = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween()){ if(mydice.basevalue<=2) {mydice.animatereroll(rand([1|2]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} else {mydice.animatereroll(rand([5|6]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} c++; } }

Name: Toss Up_weakened
Script: On Execute: var c = 0; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween()){ if(mydice.basevalue<=2) {mydice.animatereroll(rand([1|2]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} else {mydice.animatereroll(rand([5|6]) | self.screenposition() | c * 0.05);} c++; } }

Name: Goldeneye Old
Description: Do [sword] 4 damage. On|second gold[;] gain 1 dodge|
Script: On Execute: attack(4); sfxdamage(target|4); var goldUsed = e.getvar(~goldUsed~); if(d>=5) {goldUsed++;} if(goldUsed==2) {inflictself(DODGE);} e.setvar(~goldUsed~|goldUsed)

Description: Do [sword] 4 damage. On|second gold[;] gain 1 dodge|
Script: On Execute: attack(4); sfxdamage(target|4); var goldUsed = e.getvar(~goldUsed~); if(d>=5) {goldUsed++;} if(goldUsed==2) {inflictself(DODGE);} e.setvar(~goldUsed~|goldUsed)

Description: Do [sword] 1 damage. On|second gold[;] gain 1 dodge|
Script: On Execute: attack(1); sfxdamage(target|1); var goldUsed = e.getvar(~goldUsed~); if(d>=5) {goldUsed++;} if(goldUsed==2) {inflictself(DODGE);} e.setvar(~goldUsed~|goldUsed)

Name: Goldeneye
Description: Do [sword]4 damage. On|gold[;] instead gain 1 dodge

Name: Rollback
Description: Do [sword] <evar:currdamage> damage. At|start of turn[;] reduce dmg|by [sword]1 per dice in this
Script: On Execute: var currdamage = e.getvar(~currdamage~); attack(currdamage); sfxdamage(target|currdamage); e.dicehistory = [];
Script: On Start Turn: var len = e.dicehistory.length; var currdamage = e.getvar(~currdamage~); e.setvar(~currdamage~|currdamage-len); if(len > 0) {e.animate(~flashandshake~);} self.textparticle(e.dicehistory.length);

Name: Rollback_upgraded
Description: Do [sword] <evar:currdamage> damage. At|start of turn[;] reduce dmg|by [sword]1 per dice in this
Script: On Execute: var currdamage = e.getvar(~currdamage~); attack(currdamage); sfxdamage(target|currdamage); e.dicehistory = [];
Script: On Start Turn: var len = e.dicehistory.length; var currdamage = e.getvar(~currdamage~); e.setvar(~currdamage~|currdamage-len); if(len > 0) {e.animate(~flashandshake~);}

Name: Rollback_downgraded
Description: No effect on use. At|start of turn[;] reduce dmg|by [sword]1 per dice in this
Script: On Execute: e.dicehistory = []; //Combinations and dice history doesn't work
Script: On Start Turn: var len = e.dicehistory.length; var currdamage = e.getvar(~currdamage~); e.setvar(~currdamage~|currdamage-len); if(len > 0) {e.animate(~flashandshake~);}

Name: Subsidy
Description: Do [sword]5 damage|If equal[;] return a coin
Script: On Execute: attack(5); sfxdamage(target|5); var ad0 = actualdice[0].basevalue; var ad1 = actualdice[1].basevalue; if(ad0>=5) {ad0-=4;} if(ad1>=5) {ad1-=4;} if(ad0==ad1) {givedice(actualdice[0].basevalue);}

Name: Subsidy_upgraded
Description: Do [sword]5 damage|If equal[;] return a gold coin
Script: On Execute: attack(5); sfxdamage(target|5); var ad0 = actualdice[0].basevalue; var ad1 = actualdice[1].basevalue; if(ad0>=5) {ad0-=4;} if(ad1>=5) {ad1-=4;} if(ad0==ad1) {givedice(ad0+4);}
